name: Zombie Mayhem (gustavohitz)
description:
This is yet another game I made for a Unity/C# course I'm taking. Kill as many zombies as you can while trying to survive the zombie apocalypse in Zombie Mayhem! The more time you're able to survive, the more zombies you will face. And every now and then, an undead gangster will come for you. Don't forget to collect medkits to replenish your health.

Commands:

W, A, S, D, arrows -> Move

Left mouse button -> Fire
